caption: Relating to an exemption from certain motor fuel taxes for counties in this state.
undersanding:
Summary:
This bill amends the Tax Code to exempt counties in Texas from motor fuel (gasoline and diesel) taxes for their exclusive use. Counties that have already paid these taxes can file refund claims with the comptroller. This bill has no direct impact on Chinese immigrants or any other immigrant groups in the US as it only affects county government operations.

中文总结：
该法案修改德克萨斯州税法，免除县政府专用的汽油和柴油燃料税。已支付这些税款的县政府可以向主计长申请退税。该法案仅影响县政府运营，对在美华人或其他任何移民群体没有直接影响。

Most likely committees:
1. Ways and Means Committee (tax policy)
2. Transportation Committee (motor fuel related)
3. County Affairs Committee (county government operations)
